metadata.title: USN-3151-3 -- Linux kernel (Qualcomm Snapdragon) vulnerability
metadata.description: Philip Pettersson discovered a race condition in the af_packet implementation in the Linux kernel. A local unprivileged attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or run arbitrary code with administrative privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3151-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-4.4.0-1039-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1039.43 No subscription required
